attributes.action: Cut the Overseas Aid Budget by 50%
attributes.additional_details:
We the under-Signed require the UK Government to cut the Over Seas Aid Budget by 50% at the start of the 2015/16 financial year.
The UK is smaller than, Germany, France, USA, Canada, Australia, Russia & a host of other countries, yet our overseas aid budget is the largest in the world.
The savings by this measure must go towards the needy in this country and reducing the UK deficit.
